##Intern at the disciplinary commission, Boring and calculating?

WMSYGSDR

Function introduction, each line has the earnest person, again the ordinary person also has the extraordinary story. Huazhong University of Science and Technology Press Official non-fiction story platform, the story of the people will meet here.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
- In the event of an outbreak -

In fact, the civil service is just a job, not worth the pursuit of too much, as some people say that so rigid boring, or full of calculation.

”

- In the event of an outbreak -

In fact, the civil service is just a job, not worth the pursuit of too much, as some people say that so rigid boring, or full of calculation.

- In the event of an outbreak -

In fact, the civil service is just a job, not worth the pursuit of too much, as some people say that so rigid boring, or full of calculation.

”

In February 2019, my Grad school grades were announced, and I failed. Under the persuasion of my family, I applied for the provincial examination in April with an emphasis on participation, only to land successfully.

After a few months of debauchery at home, I joined the disciplinary commission in the fall of 19 with a mixture of curiosity and excitement. Relatives and friends know that I was admitted to the disciplinary commission, but also full of curiosity about my work, think I will do "big things. ".

It was supposed to be like "in the name of the people, " a group of people dressed in plain clothes, fell from the sky, the corrupt officials are carrying out gray trade away. It was not until after work that I learned that investigating and handling officials who violate discipline is not the only responsibility of the Discipline Inspection Commission.

Because the post that applies for an examination is secretary, eventually I entered the Department of Organization of County Discipline Inspection Committee, began a period of one year's practice career of civil servant.

1

Unexpectedly, soon after I started working, I had my first headache -- I couldn't speak a dialect.

In Small County towns, almost everyone in government offices speaks dialect, not to mention the township units and the masses. Whether or not you can speak the local dialect directly determines whether or not your work can be carried out smoothly.

Originally moved to this county with my family, study life nearly ten years, local language I can understand about, but basically did not open mouth. To blend in as early as possible, I began to learn to speak the local dialect. At first, the natural difficulties were so great that many of my colleagues could not help laughing when they heard what I said, "In fact, you can speak Mandarin, young people can understand, " he said. "I haven't seen you learn to speak dialect in all these years, so why bother now. "

But I did not believe this evil, and went to war with the dialect. At first I was very strange pronunciation, and people exchange easy silence, to report to the leadership work will always be asked to say again. But I believe that these are temporary, and the provisions of their own, into the unit can only speak dialect, encounter words that can not say, immediately to colleagues for advice.

After two weeks, I was able to work, talk and joke with people in the dialect, and the occasional stumbling block was less and less. When I answer the phone, I subconsciously speak in a dialect, and my friend's voice on Wechat, and occasionally pop out two local words. They used to laugh at me and correct my accent at the same time.

The effort was not in vain. I had no trouble communicating in my daily work. Many people I met for the first time thought I was from here.

The first difficulty is solved, and the second obstacle is met.

One Friday, the leadership asked me to do a survey of the situation of the seconded personnel in various units, said the meeting next Monday. Because time is more abundant, what I do is summary work again, after informing each unit to fill in a report, I am busy doing new task to go.

It wasn't until Sunday night, when I received my official wechat account, that I realized I hadn't done it. The next day at 8:00 will have a meeting, the home computer data is not complete, I rushed to the office, all units sent to the table collation summary, print a book.

By the time I finished work, it was 10:30 and I was walking down an empty street, feeling so frustrated that I wanted to give myself a good scolding.

With this lesson in mind, I began to write down my daily work plan in a notebook, write down my boss's schedule in order of urgency, record on my cell phone if I can't remember everything at once, and then sort it out later.

Because it was a joke.

Once went to other departments to do recording was found, the other side was shocked: "You Discipline Inspection Commission to do things to be recorded? TOO TERRIBLE! "

Joking aside, I have never again made a slip-and-fall problem, do everything watertight.

2

When University roommate learned that I would take the civil service examination, although encouraged, but also could not help but say, I am not worldly enough "flexible" , not fit into the system. As she said, I do have a lot of obstacles in my work because of my personality, and the first one is that I'm too thin skinned to say no.

One day, the minister asked me to go to the propaganda department to find someone to provide last year's advanced list of propaganda work, propaganda department leaders have all gone to the countryside, only a big brother in front of the computer to write material clacking.

"What? Last year's data? How can I find this? Girl, I just got here two months ago. This really can't help you. " Big Brother looks straight at the computer screen, typing while saying.

I wrung my hands and pleaded: "Big Brother, the leadership asked me to quickly find all the data, the secretary is not sure when to see, you can help me find? "

"Well, you go to the office. Usually we just provide a list of suggestions for the leaders to review, and the final data is collected in the office. "

The office gave me a rather thick material, I took it back to spread out on the table, found the list of need one after another into the document. The minister finished his work and asked me if I had all the data. I didn't dare look at her and mumbled, "it'll be done in a minute. "

She leaned over and looked at my computer, immediately frowned: "I asked you to find other departments to provide information, you just say what you want, they do not pay, their own consequences. ". How long do you have to fight like that? Do you want to do your own work when you're doing everyone else's?"

"The big brother said he couldn't find it either, and the rest of their department wasn't there... " although I was a little reluctant, I felt it wasn't a big deal. Others were busy, and I was ashamed to force them to do it.

"In this case, you just call their leader and ask him to arrange someone to do it. Even if you have to contact the office to help, you don't have to worry about it. You just do your job. "

Then I called the head of the propaganda department. He arranged for someone to find the list on his computer and send it to me. In less than five minutes, the work was finished.

I've been approached by people from other departments before, and the minister stressed to me that it's not a good idea to say no, so I thought I'd ask her first. Refusing someone out of face, helping this or that, will only lead to chaos in your own work, others may not be grateful to you.

In hindsight, I also agree that each department is most effective when doing its own job. Do a solid job, do not muddle along without prevarication, is worthy of their own, but also worthy of others.

3

The Entire Organization Department only I and the minister two people, 80 after the minister is a single independent woman, Tall and thin, bold style, quite royal sister style.

She adopted a free-range policy to me, just go to work, she arranged the work will not explain the process in advance, are let me first up, meet the things that can not be resolved before she began to guide. She said: "things do not start, I do not know how to teach you, say a theoretical method you can not remember, it is better to do while learning, do not understand you ask me. "

Just contact the department work, I because careless and inexperience, have made a lot of small mistakes.

At the beginning, a form, a document I have to change three or four times, either the Font format does not meet the standard, is not standardized. Every time I send it to the minister, she finds my mistakes and sometimes spends the morning making it, sending it for review, typing it back, changing it..

In this regard, I can only use stupid methods, all the standards of official documents used by my unit and some of the details of the experience and methods are all written down, and then go to the Internet search "Party and government organs official documents processing regulations" , "Party and government organs official documents format" , print it out and study it.

The weakness in this skill can be detected from the beginning and quickly remedied. More, need oneself to comprehend, accumulate experience in the work.

Remember once, the minister let me in the Township Disciplinary Committee mass notification, remind the report form of the town to hand in quickly. I edited the message, which was reviewed by the minister and clicked send. After a while, one after another in the group replied, and the minister looked at me and frowned and asked:
"Who did you talk to? How did you reply to all of them? "

"I was searching for the name of the town in the wechat group, and all I found was Eite... " I whispered

"Of course you have to go straight to Eite, " she sighed. "If there's a crowd of people with nicknames that don't say which township, you search the name in the unit's address book. I didn't think you had to teach them, but you should have thought of them yourself. "

In addition, the biggest headache I have is to ask the leadership for work.

I was afraid to see teachers when I was a child, just graduated from teaching afraid to see parents, now when the civil service, the most afraid is to enter the leadership office.

On my first visit to the clerk's office, the minister asked me to get a prepared document for signature. I was afraid to knock on the door and wait for the others to report. Thought as long as the signature on the line, did not expect the secretary looked for a while, picked up a pen on the change. There were people waiting in the back. When the book was finished, I picked up the file and quickly left. When I went outside, I felt a ringing in my head
I can't even read the handwriting!

What are we GONNA do? I'm GONNA have to rewrite it according to the instructions. The chief of staff happened to be in the corridor. I hurried to him for help. He managed to make out two sentences. "I'm not sure, " he said. "I'd better ask the secretary. "

I looked eagerly at the minister, she raised an eyebrow: "Look at me? At that time he changed you should immediately check, do not recognize on the spot ask him. "

I had to knock on the secretary's door again with a great deal of trepidation.

Then the minister warned me not to be like a top, only to whip it. Think before you do anything, think before you do it, otherwise it's all for naught.

She stressed that it was important not to go to the leaders all the time. Every report work, I want to understand all matters clearly, the one-time request for instructions, leadership ask what can also answer.

Running into a leadership office too often doesn't make you seem like you're overworked, it just means you're not competent enough.

4

Less than two months into my tenure, I had the biggest challenge of my civil service career so far.

The minister is going to town for a month's training. When she left, I had to do almost everything myself. I'm a classic under-the-radar type, dependent, and I'm pretty insecure without the minister. On the first day of the training, I sent hundreds of messages to the minister. She was so annoyed, she told me not to send her wechat or make any phone calls unless it was important.

It was near the end of the year, the work was in its final stages and there was an important meeting to be held. I need to inform all team members to prepare for the meeting, let them write a speech in advance to hand in; the Organization Department also has to write the meeting host and team materials, the minister asked me to write a draft.

At this time, the office also issued a notice to all departments to submit the 2019 summary and 2020 work plan. With the usual daily work, I began to scramble to work overtime life, two weeks of overtime until 90 o'clock to go home.

It didn't take long for the whole province to carry out information collection and wage statistics for civil servants in 2019. Political workers in all units in the county should take computers and go to the Organizing Department of the county Party Committee in turn to update the system's information. The leadership has sent people to help, I first finish the urgent matter at hand, then go to do the system together. The busiest time, I do all day information input, the next day to hand in materials, only the same night to work until four, the next day to get up at six to rush to the office.

For a variety of reasons, the meeting has been postponed several times, the exact time can not be determined. But I still have to collect the materials of the leaders in advance and take them to the secretary for review and signature. At this time we are busy, the leaders of the Dragon head missing end, finally back to the Wechat said immediately hand in, after no news.

One day I went to eat lunch, out of the canteen just saw a deputy secretary walking in the vicinity. He usually works in another office building, I was in a hurry to collect all the materials, stupidly ran over, asked him to finish the materials, can send me later. He waved his hand and said, "Oh, don't worry. "

The leader walked, the colleague of the side surprised way: "You are really too excellent, urge the material to urge this kind of situation. "

Later that leader seems to have shadow to me, once come to a meeting, he laughed at me: "Xiao Rong, you want to urge me to hand over the material again? "

Fortunately, the meeting went off without a hitch, and I did my job just fine. In the end, I developed the ability to do more without pressure, not to think about how to do unfinished work, only focus on doing the thing at hand, no psychological pressure, my work efficiency has improved.

Through this time, my ability has also been practical promotion, because the work is earnest and steadfast, also obtained many affirmation.

5

Half a year, I have thoroughly adapted to the system of work, life also learned to change ideas, from the perspective of a civil servant things.

In the unit, I saw a lot of real love post, dedication, full of sense of responsibility of leadership colleagues. Some are seriously ill and still on the job after major surgery; some spend years away from work, treated as guests by their young children; and some are nearing retirement with a more rigorous work attitude than young people.

In January 2020, a bout of pneumonia swept across the country, leaving no trace of our little place.

Since the beginning of the New Year, many cadres have been working hard in the front line of Epidemic Prevention. On January 25, a boy who was admitted to the Discipline Inspection Commission at the same time sent me a message on Wechat. He had already returned to work and was transferred to the special inspection team for epidemic prevention and control.

His'97, back of the envelope, just out of college.

"Not only the hospital, but also the county Party Committee, the Government Office, the Public Security Bureau, the health and Safety Commission, the CDC, the Forestry Bureau, the propaganda department... Basically all units in the county are working overtime. "

My Nose Meng ran a acid, repeatedly in the dialog box to type the words and delete, finally, only sent a short four words: "Do a good job of protection. "

"Of course! You can rest assured that the epidemic will be over soon. When the weather warms up, we'll go to the hot pot! "

I couldn't see his face, but I thought he must be smiling, bright and confident as ever.

Although we are the most common grass-roots civil servants, not what officials, but all uphold a heart for the people. We don't think we're so great, we just want to make a small contribution to make this special moment, no more grieving families, no more broken-hearted parents or children.

Duty Calls, do the right thing, then can have a clear conscience.

-END-

Author | content | young author.
